title: LEAVEBUSTER SUCKS
body: Ok, so I log in to play, go to a normal game, and I make through champ select. Game freezes, this not on my end, cause it said my internet connection was lost. I check all the forums and found this been happening to couple people, my internet didnt drop. This a Riot problem stop punishing people for your faults Riot.

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find a record of gameserver issues. In this case, it seems there was likely an issue along your route to the server or problematic network settings local to your PC. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are up to spec!

Let me know if those steps resolved your issue.
